topic.title: Add Match Segment ID to support Machine Translation

body.p: By adding a unique segment identifier to segments (mainly when imported into ), an analysis can be run on the MTLOG file using the DOS line command utility OtmMtEval.exe. New meta-information elements such as TM_ID, StoreID, and MatchSegID allow analytics teams to analyze segments where translation memory proposals have been used or rejected.
The API EqfImportMemEx allows to add the identifier to each segment of a translation during the imported of the translation memory into .
The API EqfAddMatchSegID allows to add the identifier to each segment of a translation memory already imported into .
Inside an external translation memory, all data is stored inside the metadata element.
Both APIs are described in the document Technical Reference, which is part of the distribution.
